title: Yi Xin Vegetarian
description: Also known as "Refreshing Vegetarian Restaurant." English descriptions on menu available. Chinese name 怡新素食, address 天河区林和西路161号中泰国际广场6楼. Not accessible for wheelchairs. Take the escalator on the left side of the building (restaurant is situated above the McDonalds).
streetAddress: 4F, Central Plaza, 161 Linhe West Rd, Tianhe District
